text: Joseph Payne (1984 â€“ January 2020) was an American heavy metal bassist and guitarist. He was born in Tampa, Florida. Until 2011, Payne played bass in the heavy metal band Divine Heresy. He was also a member of death metal band Nile from 2005 to 2007. Payne died in January 2020 at the age of 35. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American bass guitarists Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Tampa, Florida
title: Joe Payne
